original_text: In the year of the jubile the field shall return unto him of whom it was bought, even to him to whom the possession of the land did belong.
korean_text: 그가 판 밭은 희년에 그 판 사람 곧 그 땅의 원주인에게로 되돌아갈지니라

sentences.original_text: In the year of the jubile
the field shall return unto him
even to him to whom the possession of the land did belong
sentences.korean_translation: 곧 그 땅의 소유가 속하던 자에게로
